Replies.Reply: December 9, 1983 --
We are the secret of the Universe.
So you are the ones.
You should have told us.
Great Mother!  This changes both!  What have we done?
I've been a long time waiting for you.
Bi-la kaifa.
Bi-la kaifa.
Father.
Irulan.
A Third Stage Guild Navigator will be here within minutes!
I shall want telepathy during his visit and a report when we're finished.
Yes?
Leave us.
Oh yes?
Yes.
Yes.
Who is this Paula Atreides to the Guild?
I want fifty legions of Sardaukar on Arrakis at once.
Why have you brought me here?
Ah?  But your lack of action demanded it.
Impossible!
Stop your speaking!!
If Feyd wishes, he can meet you with my blade in his hand.
I sit on the throne!!
We felt his presence.
He is here, my lord.
Yes, my Lord.
A chance for escape? But for whom?
And your son will pay with you.
Jessica, you know it must be done. I enjoin you to stand guard at the door and practice the meditation of peace.
Now you come here.
Some strength there. Surprising!
Come here.
Pain.
STOP! Put your hand in the box.
I hold at your neck the gom jabbar. Don't pull away or you'll feel that poison. A Duke's son must know about many poisons --
Let us say I suggest you may be human.
You feel the flesh crisping?
Flesh dropping off.
You know when people speak the truth?
Perhaps you are the Kwisatz Haderach.
Jessica!
I sense your teachings in him. Ignore the regular order of training. His safety requires The Voice.
What can be done has been done.
They tried and died.
Kill this child!!  She's an abomination!!
Sister of Paul Muad'dib.
Stop him, Jessica!
You must share with us.
Where are the Harkonnens from here?
I know, Thufir, I'm sitting with my back to the door.
I heard you, Dr. Yueh and Gurney coming down the hall.
I'd know the difference.
My father sent you to test me. Music then?
I'm sorry Gurney.
What's gotten into Gurney? He's not faking.
Is this what you seek?
Would you really have drawn my blood?
Things have been so serious here lately.
Dr. Yueh, do you have any information on the worms of Arrakis?
Only?!
The storms and the worms. Is it true, that the sand can blow at seven hundred kilometers per hour?
Well, how do the Fremen survive there?
I know.  But if it is a trap then why are we going?
Duncan!
Why?  I wish you were coming with us.
May the hand of God be with us all, Duncan.
Father.
I want you to be proud of me.
What does she fear?
What about my Father?
She's using The Voice.
No.
What's in the box?
The Voice again.
Are you suggesting a Duke's son is an animal?
It burns.
I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer.
THE PAIN!
I see the truth of it.
I know it.
What is it?
Where?
I have heard of it.
Did they try and fail?
MOTHER! Tell me!
There is a traitor among us.
Are you a Fremen?
He's hiding something.
"Your gift is a blessing of the river."
No.
Will we see a worm?
Always?
Why do they come?
Is there a relationship between the worms and the spice?
Liet?
Duncan!!  Duncan!!
Remove her gag!
I have NO FEELINGS!!  Why?
Hurry!
Hurry -- This crashing may bring a worm.
House Atreides is ruined.
This moon holds my past.
This moon holds my future.
You carry my unborn sister in your womb!
Father!
Yueh's left the plans for the weirding modules.
We have to get to that mountain of rock.
Faster!!
Run!
Drum sand!
Do you smell it?
A thumper.
What do you call the mouse shadow in the second moon?
Could I be known as Paul Muad'dib?
Water on Arrakis!!!
I am only a seed.
No one ever dreamed there would be so many.

Our shared enemy the Harkonnens, are once again in control of Arrakis.  Stilgar, your leader, has asked me and my mother to crush the Harkonnens.  We must do more than this.  We must totally destroy all spice production on Arrakis.  The Guild and the entire universe depends on spice.
The weirding way has long been a Bene Gesserit secret.  With my mother's help, my father isolated an element of the weirding way and externalised it.

Because of the Harkonnen treachery, my father's armies were never able to fully develop this new form.  This is what I will teach you.  You will be the fiercest and most feared fighters in the Universe.
Move back!
Chuksa!
To avenge my father, I will turn you into killing machines.
The most lethal poison in the Universe.
Did they try and fail?
What if she should fail?
She did it!
Set the range for two meters.
My own name is a killing word.  Will it be a healing word as well?
Now!
When the spice flow stops, the entire Universe will turn to Arrakis.  The Baron and the Emperor himself will be forced to deal with us.
Long live the fighters!
We surprised a band of smugglers.
You've no need of your weapons with me Gurney Halleck.
Don't you trust your own eyes.
Hurry!  All I see is darkness.
Your time has come.
Long live the fighters!
Alia keeps pace with the storm.
Gurney, now!
Let him stand free!
In payment of the many years of service to my family, you may know ask of me anything you wish.  Anything at all.
Do you need my life, old friend?
It is yours.
I mean this, Thufir.  If you are to strike, do it now.
Carry this noble Atreides warrior away.
No!
Don't try your powers on me.  Try looking into that place where you dare not look.

You saw a part of what the race needs in the beginning.  In time you perverted the truth.  You sought to control human breeding and intermix a select few according to a selfish master plan.  How little you understand.
SILENCE!
I remember your gom jabbar, now you remember mine.  I can kill with a word.
There is a Harkonnen among you.  Give the Harkonnen a blade and let him stand forth.
The Emperor's blade.
Now, I will tell you how it will be.
You will sit on a throne on Selusa Secundus, your prison planet.  Either that or you will die.
The Fremen have the word of Muad'dib.

Each day the palms along the outer wall of the Palace at Arrakeen consume enough water to sustain the lives of one hundred men. The palms were placed by the Harkonnens to flaunt their water wealth in front of the city Fremen.
Those sounds could be imitated.
Yes. Perhaps he would at that.
Many dangers exist on Arrakis. For one, we know the Harkonnens would not have given up their CHOAM company contract so easily.
You will make a formidable Duke!
We have our new army.
Dr. Yueh, put the weirding module on him.
Clear and lock the room.
Activate a fighter.
Why isn't the shield up yet?
Set up a sonar probe immediately!
Sector 6 - 80 -- copy the sixth -- the summit -- the eight the quadrant over the ninth plus eighty -- four circles -- weave the eighty and call the fourth copy --
No music. I'm packing this for the crossing. Shield practice.
Not sorry enough.
Guard yourself for true!
Replies.Didascalie: (his voice sounding strange through the forcefield)

Replies.Reply: We'd have joined each other in death.
If you'd fought one whit below your abilities I'd have scratched you a good one.
Yes. I sensed the play in you lad, but this can no longer be play. Tomorrow we leave for Arrakis! Arrakis is real. The Harkonnens are real.
They shall come all for violence: their faces shall sup as the east wind. And they shall gather the captivity of the sand.
Behold as a wild ass in the desert go I forth to my work.
I hope I made myself clear. You may call him "The Duke," "My lord," or "Sire." And there is a more ancient term you might keep in mind -- "Noble Born."
Sire!
Yes, Sire.
We're wasting time, Sire.
The young master is a trained Mentat, an advanced student of Prana Bindu has studied under some of the finest teachers in the Universe.
Dust cloud ahead, Sire.
The worm is eight minutes away, Sire.
We're going to be heavy, Sire.
Gods, what a monster.
LONG LIVE DUKE LETO!
Paul!!  Paul!!
You young pup!  You young pup!
Atomics!
My Lord?
Thufir.  Come.
This is a Harkonnen animal.  Let me, please, my Lord.
It can render flesh to dust in minutes.
I've brought House Atreides down.  I've destroyed the new army's weirding modules.
When you see the Baron, remember the tooth!  The tooth!
She lives?
Paul.
I was on my way to say goodbye to you.  I have to go on ahead.
It's something for your father.  He wants to talk to you.
I'll see you in Arrakis.  May the hand of God be with you.
Thank you for joining me, Paul.
It will be good to get to our new home and have all this upset behind us.
My son.
Soon they'll begin to fold space.
So you are Dr. Kynes, the Imperial Ecologist?
This is my son, Paul.
I understand we have you to thank for these stillsuits, Doctor.
It's all right Gurney.
My thanks.
Wormsign? Is it wormsign?
What happens now?
How many men do you have?
Damn the spice! Get out of there.
Damn sloppy -- really damn sloppy.
Replies.Didascalie: (out loud to himself as he watches the men scrambling)

Replies.Reply: What's that you're saying?
Duncan!  What have you discovered about the Fremen, Duncan -- tell me.  Why haven't we heard from you?
What happened?  What?
The shield!
Yueh!
He's sabotaged the house generators, we're wide open.
Now!
The seed must grow.
The sleeper must awaken.
Who calls Pad Nine?
Have sighting confirmed. Stand by for fix.
Spotter control -- give me a report by the numbers.
Ordered by whom?
Seventeen Great Houses of the Lansraad have reported a significant delay in delivery of spice per CHOAM agreement.
Tell me of your homeworld, Usul.
I vowed never to regret my decision. I'll pay for my own mistakes.
Your Reverence.
Paul!
I must not fear.  Fear is the mind-
So many reminders of the scarcity of water.
He's hiding something -- holding something back.
I must place more trust in my friends.

Replies.Didascalie: (We see Yueh turn toward her, fearful.)

Replies.Reply: I must speak with you Leto!
Yes?
I know the Bhotani Jib and Chakobsa, all the hunting languages.
That's it! The Missionaria Protectiva has been here planting protective legends against a day of Bene Gesserit need. And that day has come. I must play out this sham.
I know the Dark things and the way of the Great Mother. Miseces prejin.
I know many things. I know you came prepared for violence with a weapon in your bodice.
And the means of my death should I prove otherwise.
Now we will see which way the decision tips.
It's a crysknife.
Here is why this Fremen has taken service with me, to ask that one question. Delay is as dangerous as the wrong answer.
Did you think that I, knowing the mysteries of the Great Mother, would not know the maker?
Mapes, you've sheathed that blade unblooded.
I must speak with you Leto!
Yueh's sign.  He's left a satchell.
Oh great mother!  He's trying the voice.
The calming exercise.
Excellent!
There's no need to fight over me.
First cut my son's bonds.
That's it.
Oh, my God!
Leto!  Leto!
Where are we do you think?
Bring these satchels!
He knows.
I'm ready.
It's deafening!
Paul!
Man-carved steps.
No, but many consider my training valuable.
I must do this for Paul, but what of my unborn child?
The ultimate awareness spectrum narcotic.
No!  This is the place where we cannot look.  The place only for the eyes of the Kwisatz Haderach.
Now my daughter and I are both Reverend Mothers.
Alia.
Alia begins walking.  She appears to be angry.
Alia!
ALIA!
Alia!  What is it?
Stop him yourself.
It is by will alone I set my mind in motion.
My Lord!
The Atreides will be leaving Caladan soon, Baron, and I have here your answer from Duke Leto.
He wishes to inform you that Vendetta --
Take them to the desert, as the traitor suggested and worms will destroy the evidence.  Their bodies must never be found.
I'd thought of many pleasures with you.
Replies.Didascalie: (whispering to Jessica, rubbing the spittle around on her face with his hand, delicately)

Replies.Reply: It was Feyd.
He's coming round, my Lord.
Piter.
What does Leto say, Piter?
My plan!
You're so beautiful my Baron Your skin, love to me Your diseases lovingly cared for For all eternity.
I won't tell you who the traitor is or when we'll attack.  However, the Duke will die before these eyes and he'll know that it is I -- Baron Vladimir Harkonnen -- who encompasses his doom.
You wish now to join your wife, is that it, traitor?
Take him away.
Duke Leto Atreides.  Someone's torn the insignia off your uniform.  Such carelessness.
It was Feyd?
It was Feyd!  Where is the ducal signet ring?  I must have his ring.
You killed the doctor too soon, you fool!
Where is your ring?
You do not answer!
He's crying!
He's crying!  He's crying, Piter.  What does he mean?
I'm alive!!!  I'm alive!!!
The Baron floats to Rabban and begins lovingly massaging Rabban's massive neck as he speaks to him.
Where's my doctor?
Feyd, no, no!  Thufir's a Harkonnen now, aren't you Thufir?
I have her, Majesty!
Put the pick in there Pete And turn it round real neat.
Who is the traitor?
I will.
All I can see is an Atreides that I want to kill.
The righteous!
I wish it.
Why prolong the inevitable?  I will kill you!  I will kill him!
Who is the little one?  A pet, perhaps?
Atreides army soldiers milling, YELLING noisily.
illuminated by a shaft of light coming from a chimney-like exit above. DR. KYNES and his Fremen guard are standing next to Gurney.
The two parties meet and are introduced.
Harkonnens.
We found and removed another sabotage device. I think it will go up now.
I am the Shadout Mapes, your housekeeper, Noble Born. What are your orders.
You know the ancient tongues?
As the legend says.
Do you know this my lady?
Do you know its meaning?
My lady, when one has lived with prophecy for so long, the moment of revelation is a shock.
Take the water of my life!
I am a servant of the His Majesty the Emperor. I have served His Majesty on Arrakis long enough for my eyes to change.
They are Fremen suits. I hope they fit well, my lord.
The Mahdi will greet you with holy words and your gifts will be a blessing.
Most of the desert natives here are a superstitious lot. They mean no harm. With your permission, I will check the security of your suits.
It's a high-efficiency filter and heat exchange system. Perspiration passes through the first layer and is gathered in the second. The salt is separated.
With a Fremen suit in good working order, one can sustain life for weeks, even in the deep desert.
You've worn a stillsuit before?
Your suit is fitted desert fashion. Who told you how to do that?
That it is.
He shall know your ways as if born to them.
Southeast over the Shield Wall. That's where I told your sandmaster to concentrate his harvesting.
Where there is spice and spice mining there are always worms.
Always.
To protect their territory. Vibrations attract them.
Calling Harvester Pad Nine. Wormsign!
Replies.Didascalie: (into radio, after having found the frequency)

Replies.Reply: They'll work until the very last minute.
Nothing.
You are about to witness something few have seen -- watch!  Watch!
DUKE LETO'S VOICE Guard.  Open the door.
The Duke walks down the steps to a very narrow passageway.  The passageway becomes very dark.
up to the CAPTAIN and a TECHNICIAN.
Fremen carry the Fremen REVEREND MOTHER RAMALLO in on a litter.  The old Reverend Mother is old a frail yet extremely beautiful and mysterious.  She turns to Paul and Jessica with a strange look.
Stilgar and Paul return to the ledge above the Hall of Rites.  A MONK PRIEST steps forward, addresses the crowd, silencing them.  The other monks move back carrying their smoking cleansing bags.
We see Jessica sitting, shoulders tight and spasming -- straining, her eyelids half-closed and flickering.
The old Reverend Mother slowly extends a hand toward Jessica's shoulder.

The old Reverend Mother Ramallo slumps forward onto the stone, dead.  The crowd waits.  The corpse is tenderly removed.  Jessica very slowly opens her eyes and looks about her.  The monk holds the jug to her lips.
Paul continues to stare at Chani.  He moves to her.

The Rock Ledge of Sietch Tabr is filled with Fedaykin and monks; Chani, Jessica, Gurney and Stilgar stand together near the back.  Paul moves out on the Rock Ledge overlooking the Hall of Rites which is crowded with Fremen warriors who chant "Maud'Dib" along with the powerful sounds of the WIND ORGAN and FREMEN war DRUMS.
Get that shield up!
The shield!  The shield!
Long live Duke Leto!
What are your orders, Piter?
Duncan Idaho kills a Sardaukar soldier and rushes forward frantically.  His eyes blaze intensely.  He yells out to the other Atreides soldiers.
- NIGHT - SHIELD EFFECT  Duncan's dead, shielded body slides sparking in the dark against the passageway walls.
Yes, my lord Baron.
What happened?  What happened to you?
Who is this Muad'dib?
Perhaps these are the ones Mapes told us of.
Are you trained in the ways of the desert?
We call that one Muad'dib.
The Rocks of Arrakis hold many secrets.
The Water of Life.
Long live the fighters!
It is the legend.
Come with me.  I'll show you an easier way down.
Seitch Tabr.
Tell me of your homeworld, Usul.
Come with me.
You are my life.
Paul!
The legend.
Change it that we may all drink of it.
It is changed!
Muad'dib!
Break!
What will you call her?
But Your Reverence, they won't have her around them.
Mother.
Mother - help me!
It's Paul.  He's taken the Water of Life.
I am the messenger from Muad'dib.  Poor Emperor, I'm afraid my brother won't be very pleased with you.
Not until you tell them both who I really am.
And how can this be?
They're even better on the battlefield than in the training rooms!!
He's been repeating that name ever since we found him.
Bring in the messenger.
